name: Tiles Hop: Music EDM Game 2022
description:
Get control of the song beat - Feel the music as you tap Explore the game and be the winner of our piano game challenges.

Tiles Hop: Music EDM Game 2022

How to play:
- Tap on the dark tiles (piano keys) to feel the rhythm and chords in order to form a pleasant rise-and-fall pattern of sounds.
- For a complete music experience, headphones are recommended

Game Features:
1.Master's challenge kicks off! Reach the peak experience of speed challenge.
2.There are more albums and songs of various styles.
3.Easy to master with visual effect incomparable.
4.Enjoy a brand-new level of sound quality.

Song request: Suggest any piano songs you love, we will find and introduce it to the game as quickly as possible.
Lightweight to install.
